channel.title: Revenge-PK Development Team Needed
channel.description:
Hello everyone and welcome to my Development thread. Revenge-PK is the brain child of me and Toby. We want to have the next best RSPS. I have been around MoparScape for a month or 2 now and I have seen the immense amount of talent that it's members hold, thats why I am putting my development thread here and no where else. [b]Positions Available:[/b] Web-designer: 1/2 (I fill one of the positions) Coders: 0/2 Scripters: 0/1 Graphic designers: 0/3 Advertisers: 0/4 Back-up hoster: 0/1 Forum Moderators: 0/3 [b]Requirements for each position:[/b] Web-Designer: You must know sufficient knowledge of HTML & CSS. Knowledge of Javascript & Jquery will take the spot first. Coders: You must be good. I'm not going to give the spot to anyone. You must provide proof that you can code (releases, tutorials, etc) and that you are trustworthy. Scripters: Knowledge of Php & SQL. If you have knowledge in this to a good extent you will take the spot quick. Graphic Designers: Must be very artistic. Show examples of your work. Advertiser: No requirements. Just know that you are expected to show that you are effectively helping our community. If we see no effort you will be dropped. Back-Up Hoster: You must be able to host from your computer in the event that a VPS runs out or goes down for some reason. Forum Moderators: Active everyday. Keep the spam away. This means you must post actively everyday.** **If you are going to be away for an extended amount of time you must notify an owner or admin. Also note: If you own a copy of Vbulletin or IPB you will auto get rank if you are willing to share with us. If you have a copy please reply with the version and themes. [b]Payments:[/b] Monetary Payment: None At This Time. Staff Payment: The appropriate ranks will get staff. For example A coder may get admin while an advertiser gets no staff.*** ***Just an example. All applicants must have MSN. Project Forums: [url=http://revenge-pk.com]Revenge-PK Forums[/url]
Name: Age: Position Applied For: Years/Amount Of Experience: Example Of Work: Why You Should Be Accepted:

item.title: Revenge-PK Development Team Needed
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

Who would apply for this piece of shit? No offense but you give no examples of future things that will be added you give no current features… And not only no features there isn’t one spec of information about anything server related besides for applications?

Read full topic

Age:15
Position Applied For: Graphic Designer
Years/Amount Of Experience: 4 Years
Example Of Work:I’ve made a shit ton of banners and backgrounds, etc.
Why You Should Be Accepted:I’ve got experience, I know what I’m doing, and I seem to be the first to apply.

EDIT : PM me if you’d like to see some of my banners, backgrounds, anything. I’ll be happy to upload it for you.[/quote]

Show some examples we’ll see what we can do.

Read full topic

item.title: Revenge-PK Development Team Needed
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

Hello everyone and welcome to my Development thread. Revenge-PK is the brain child of me and Toby. We want to have the next best RSPS. I have been around MoparScape for a month or 2 now and I have seen the immense amount of talent that it’s members hold, thats why I am putting my development thread here and no where else.

Positions Available:

Web-designer: 1/2 (I fill one of the positions)
Coders: 0/2
Scripters: 0/1
Graphic designers: 0/3
Advertisers: 0/4
Back-up hoster: 0/1
Forum Moderators: 0/3

Requirements for each position:

Web-Designer: You must know sufficient knowledge of HTML & CSS. Knowledge of Javascript & Jquery will take the spot first.

Coders: You must be good. I’m not going to give the spot to anyone. You must provide proof that you can code (releases, tutorials, etc) and that you are trustworthy.

Scripters: Knowledge of Php & SQL. If you have knowledge in this to a good extent you will take the spot quick.

Graphic Designers: Must be very artistic. Show examples of your work.

Advertiser: No requirements. Just know that you are expected to show that you are effectively helping our community. If we see no effort you will be dropped.

Back-Up Hoster: You must be able to host from your computer in the event that a VPS runs out or goes down for some reason.

Forum Moderators: Active everyday. Keep the spam away. This means you must post actively everyday.**

**If you are going to be away for an extended amount of time you must notify an owner or admin.

Also note: If you own a copy of Vbulletin or IPB you will auto get rank if you are willing to share with us. If you have a copy please reply with the version and themes.

Payments:

Monetary Payment: None At This Time.

Staff Payment: The appropriate ranks will get staff. For example A coder may get admin while an advertiser gets no staff.***

***Just an example.

All applicants must have MSN.

Project Forums: Revenge-PK Forums
